release.enhancement: It is now possible to force the test runner to fork a new thread by setting thread=true to avoid timeouts for long-running tests. Added JUnitEEThreadedServlet which has thread=true by default.
release.refactoring: Splitted output producer in model and render part.
release.enhancement: JUnitEEServlet produces filtered stack traces by default, filtering can be disabled by setting filterTrace=false
Nested formatter elements for ant task and test element. filtertrace attribute for task and test.
release.bugfix: result.jsp of the example web application works with renamed EJB
release.enhancement: Added security section to the user guide.
Added attribute servletclass to JUnitEE war task to specify the servlet class for the generated deployment descriptor.
release.refactoring: JUnitEE war task is now a subclass of the ant war task and therefore inherits all it's features
